>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/accounts/me/google-search-console"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the Google Search Console siteUrl for the authenticated account.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"site_url":{"type":"string","pattern":"^(https?://|sc-domain:)\\S+"}},"title":"UpdateSiteUrlRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"account":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"siteUrl":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AccountConfig"}}},"description":"Google Search Console configuration updated on the account"},"401":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"account":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"siteUrl":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AccountConfig"}}},"description":"Unauthorized"},"412":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"account":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"siteUrl":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AccountConfig"}}},"description":"GSC api denied or missing"},"422":{"content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"account":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"siteUrl":{"type":"string"}},"title":"AccountConfig"}}},"description":"Validation error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
